description: Try our easy to follow 7 Layer Bars With Popcorn & Kit-Kat recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: 7 Layer Bars With Popcorn & Kit-Kat Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup Cobs Popcorn Sweet As Gluten Free
170g Nestle Kitkat Original Milk Chocolate Block
0.5 cup Nestle Bakers' Choice Milk Choc Bits

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/ 160°C fan forced. Grease and line a 28 x 18 cm lamington pan with baking paper.

In a small bowl, mix biscuit crumbs together with melted butter and press mixture into pan. Pour Nestle sweetened condensed milk evenly over mixture. Top with popcorn, Nestle Kit Kat, coconut, pecans and Nestle milk choc bits.
Bake for 25 minutes or until golden brown. Cool, cut into pieces and serve.
